img_summary: The image depicts the "Special-made Bone-Strengthening Pellet," a rare item in *Black Myth: Wukong*. It is obtained from Xu Dog in Yellow Wind Ridge after defeating Chen Loong in The New West, who requests the pill. The pellet can be given to Chen Loong to gain access to the Zodiac Village, playing a key role in progressing the narrative.
